title: Welcome to StatCalc PWA!
message: Try the new Progressive Web App for a better mobile experience. Install it to your home screen for offline access to all calculators.

title: 5 New Calculators Added
message: Check out our latest additions: Multiple Regression, Logistic Regression, Cluster Analysis, Post-Hoc Tests, and Sample Size Calculator.

title: Scheduled Maintenance
message: GitHub Pages will undergo maintenance on [DATE]. The app will continue to work offline if you've used it before.

title: Special Offer: Premium Course
message: Learn advanced statistical analysis with our comprehensive online course. Limited time 50% discount for StatCalc users!
